cliUse.description: Check if a link try to rick roll you.
cliUse.optionL: --link -l <link>         URL (If not given, check your clipboard)
cliUse.optionV: --version -v             Show the version used by Rickdetect

version.info: Your rickdetect actually use the %VERSION% version

fetch.errENOTFOUND: Unable to access the site : Network error or problem of the website.
fetch.notValidURL: %LINK% isn't a valid address, it does not contain domain (.com, .fr, etc).

publish.notFound: This link is not suspect... Intensity : %INTENSITY%

error.emptyContact: What you wrote is empty / too little.. :
error.emptyContactInfo: Choose a method for contact you (like your Twitter or Discord).
error.emptyDescription: What you wrote is empty / too little / too big.. :
error.emptyDescriptionInfo: Indicate the description of this request.
error.emptyTitle: What you wrote is empty / too little.. :
error.emptyTitleInfo: Indicate the title of this request.
